description: Go off-road for a quick hike and head back into town in comfort and confidence with the heathered slubbed Aerobora Short-Sleeve Shirt. Unique AirExchange fabric construction and technology provide advanced air permeability and enhanced drying time, so you stay cool. If a big reach for the next boulder is in your sights on a sunny climb, the UPF-25 rating and stretch construction will keep you comfortable and protected. The moisture-wicking, quick-drying polyester will ensure that an intense trek in this woven shirt won't weigh you down. Lightweight, breathable, packable, and with an updated fit, this will be a go-to shirt for your next trip.
name: Marmot Aerobora SS - Mens
